title: Choose task management model for PARA Workspace v1.4
context: PARA Workspace v1.4 needs a clear task management model. The previous version had no formal definition of how backlog.md, sprint-current.md, and done.md relate to each other. We needed to decide between a single-file approach, a 3-file model with sprint-current as canonical, or a hybrid model.
decision: Adopted the Hybrid 3-File Model: backlog.md is the canonical task store (primary read/write via /backlog workflow), sprint-current.md is a derived focus view showing only active tasks, and done.md is a derived archive for completed tasks.

options.label: Single file (backlog only)
options.description: Keep everything in backlog.md with sections for different states

options.label: 3-file with sprint-current as canonical
options.description: sprint-current.md is the single source of truth, backlog and done are derived

options.label: Hybrid 3-file model
options.description: backlog.md is canonical, sprint-current and done are derived views

consequences: The /backlog workflow remains the primary interface. Agent generates sprint-current.md and done.md as derived views. Users don't need to change their workflow.
